original_title:
Democrats are currently losing their minds over President Trump and Kristi Noem painting the southern border wall BLACK to let it get super hot from the sun.

It's being done so the criminals would burn their hands to the touch if they even tried.  — The Donald
article_summary: Democrats are criticizing President Trump and Governor Kristi Noem for painting the southern border wall black to deter illegal crossings, with some joking about the wall's potential to melt or be bypassed. Some users suggest additional security measures such as razor blades, bear traps, electric transmission lines, fire ants, and minefields.</s>
